column2: the place is not designed for big groups. It's a really intimate
column3: dark setting where you bring the hottest girl you know for a romantic dinner to get waited on by sophisticated hipster-esque young people who know they have to live up to the name Bavette's has created for itself. The décor is reminiscent of a French speakeasy
column4: so awesome!  We kind of walked in with a group of 16
column5: half of which were over 50. Needless to say we got some strange looks and I could just see the fear in the staff's faces as we filed in and made our way to the basement (yes
column7: go see it if you haven't).
